dialogues.name: Player
dialogues.dialogueText: Well... It seems that the whole city is in complete darkness...

dialogues.name: Player
dialogues.dialogueText: And this total silence makes no sense!

dialogues.name: Player
dialogues.dialogueText: Not a single scream or siren god dammit...

dialogues.name: Player
dialogues.dialogueText: Better go check with Ethan to see what's going on
